name: Mera Parivar
briefDescription: Mera Parivar strives to bring education to the less privileges children , empowerment of women and sustainable livelihood. It focus on Education, Skill building and income generation. After over five years of its existence as a ‘family’  and continuously striving to enhance capacity and developed human resources of these neglected and forgotten population , Mera Parivar today has skill building for income generation centres for women, basic formal education for children and a free medical centre. Mera Parivar also upgrade its attempt to provide higher learnings in the form of computer education. It also sponsor promising students in the form of sponsorship. It also initiate small scale women’s Self Help Groups  (SHG) and awareness generation on ration card and voter Identity card.
